title: User Authentication with Email - Success
description: Verify that the user can successfully authenticate using email and password with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input valid email and password.
Click login button.
Verify user is successfully logged in and dashboard is displayed.

title: User Authentication with Email - Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input invalid email or incorrect password.
Click login button.
Verify login is unsuccessful and error message is displayed.

title: OCR Document Scanning - Accurate Text Extraction
description: Check that OCR scanning extracts text accurately from a clear bill document, meeting defined accuracy thresholds.

steps.description: Open the document scanning feature.
Scan a sample clear bill document with text.
Verify extracted text matches the document content with acceptable accuracy.

title: OCR Document Scanning - Poor Quality Image Handling
description: Verify the OCR scanning gracefully handles poor quality or blurry images by showing appropriate feedback or retry options.

steps.description: Open the document scanning feature.
Scan a low quality or blurry document image.
Verify user receives feedback indicating low scan quality and can retry scanning.

title: Create New Bill/Contract Item
description: Verify users can create a new bill or contract item with all required fields and it is persisted correctly and appears in the item list.

steps.description: Navigate to items management page.
Click 'Add New' and fill in required bill or contract details.
Submit the creation form.
Verify new item is persisted and visible with correct details in the list.

title: Read/View Existing Item Details
description: Verify that the user can view full details of an existing bill, contract, or subscription item correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to items list.
Select an existing item.
Verify full item details are displayed accurately.

title: Update Existing Item
description: Test that changes to an existing item’s data are saved correctly and immediately reflected in the UI.

steps.description: Select an existing bill/contract item.
Modify editable fields.
Save the changes.
Verify updated item details are persisted and displayed correctly.

title: Delete Item and Verify Removal
description: Verify that deleting an item removes it from the database and the UI without errors.

steps.description: Select an existing item.
Perform delete action and confirm if prompted.
Verify the item is removed from the list and cannot be accessed anymore.

title: Search and Filter Items
description: Validate the search and filter functionalities correctly return items matching criteria for bills, contracts, and subscriptions.

steps.description: Navigate to items management page.
Enter search keywords and apply different filters (e.g., by category or urgency).
Verify displayed items correspond to the search query and filter selections.

title: AI Chat Coach - Relevant Financial Advice
description: Verify that the AI Chat Coach provides relevant and contextually accurate financial advice based on user's current expenses and data.

steps.description: Open AI Chat Coach interface.
Input questions or prompts related to user's financial data.
Verify the AI response is relevant, accurate, and based on user's expenses.

title: Pro Subscription Access Control - Feature Restriction
description: Verify that premium features are inaccessible when the user does not have an active Pro subscription.

steps.description: Use app features that require Pro subscription without subscribing.
Verify access is restricted and paywall or upgrade prompts appear.

title: Pro Subscription Purchase Flow
description: Validate that the user can successfully subscribe to Pro via the paywall with RevenueCat, and feature access updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to paywall and initiate Pro subscription purchase.
Complete the purchase successfully.
Verify user subscription status updates to Pro and premium features unlock.

title: Dashboard Displays Accurate Financial Summaries
description: Confirm that the dashboard screen correctly aggregates and displays the user’s financial data with no errors or missing information.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard.
Verify all displayed financial summaries and quick actions represent the actual user data accurately.

title: User Profile Update and Persistence
description: Verify that changes to user profile and preferences in settings are saved correctly and reflected throughout the app.

steps.description: Navigate to settings.
Update user profile fields and preferences.
Save the settings.
Verify updated information is persisted and reflected in relevant app sections.

title: Renewal Reminders Sync with Calendar
description: Verify that renewal reminders created for expiring items correctly sync with the device’s calendar and trigger notifications on time.

steps.description: Add a renewal reminder for an expiring subscription or contract.
Verify the reminder appears in device calendar app and triggers notification at expected time.

title: Network Status Monitoring - Offline Mode Activation
description: Test that the app detects network loss accurately and switches to offline mode seamlessly without disrupting user experience.

steps.description: Simulate network disconnection while using the app.
Verify the app changes status to offline and continues functioning with cached data where applicable.

title: Network Status Monitoring - Network Recovery
description: Verify that when network connectivity is restored, the app detects it and synchronizes data as expected.

steps.description: Simulate network re-connection after offline mode.
Verify the app detects reconnection, syncs data, and restores full network-enabled functionality.

title: UI Components Sensory Feedback - Haptic and Audio Cues
description: Verify that all actionable UI components trigger appropriate haptic and audio feedback, enhancing user interaction.

steps.description: Use various UI components including buttons, toasts, and error boundaries.
Verify the corresponding haptic and audio feedback triggers on each interaction.

title: Error Boundary Displays Friendly Message on Failure
description: Ensure that any UI error caught by error boundaries displays a user-friendly error message, not a crash, and offers recovery options.

steps.description: Simulate an error within a component wrapped by an error boundary.
Verify the error boundary catches the error and displays a helpful message with recovery options.
